title: Looking for people to joining ranked 5 (Mid Bronze - Mid Gold Pref)
body:
1. Online on all/most nights during ranked team times
2. Plays Decently (not a feeder and not choosing silly picks)
3. Discord (Optional)
4. Wants that ward skin

My OP.GG: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=NoobProBeast
Support > ADC = Mid > Jungle > Top

Comment below with summoner name and your op.gg and lane preference.

replies.body:
i play all roles

main pref mid/adc , champs i use
mid  - diana , ahiri. akali
adc - trist, mf, lucian
supp-braum,leona,lulu
top-fiora,irelia
jg-xin zhao,khazix,irelia,elise

stuck in b5 as i coudnt carry hard enough last season s3. 

pros : great at making teamfights/plays 
will communicate well with team
mechanics are great 
level of champ understanding listed above high

cons: possibility of flaming and tiliting due to possible win conditions
sometimes get cocky when ahead
weak late game

ign: AfterEffect

IGN: proMINscuous
Lane Preference: Mid, ADC, JG, Top, Supp
Have Discord. 
Op.gg: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=prominscuous

oh dw im on my main now, kk add me -MrLazyDude 
Any role will do for me, i am pro :)
hey add my main acc i cant be bothered to log onto it but its - MrLazyDude im silver 5, and dont wanna rank solo q anymore that much so i wanna play some rank team
